response.overview: Pablus Gallinazo shares with us the experience of his voluntary confinement while a large part of the population tries to get used to this new way of life, which is demanded by the spread of the pandemic. For Pablus is something normal, he had already got used to go out only once a week for the very necessary, his house is that space where he allows himself to live what interests him most; from there he writes a novel and now works with his wife and the symphony of the Universidad Autónoma de Bucaramanga, in the arrangements of several of his songs that aim to preserve his legacy and make known to other generations one of the most important artists that has had the department of Santander.
response.title: Pablus Gallinazo
